response.answer_text: There is a lot of websites where you can make your own website just by drag and drop, or filling pre-made templates, to count, wix, weebly, squarspace, wordpress, click funnels, even some hosting companies have their own page builders lime Godaddy among others. The first problem, is that you have the one who will cost you less money and you end up having the same website as the costly solutions. I find that WordPress will be the best, because you can host it on any platform of your choice, you own totally the content, because you can backup all of your files on your hard drive on a daily basis, so whenever you make changes to your website, that will reflect additional folders on your hard drive where other solutions don't let you make this. The second problem, and this is very important is that you have to make a website or a landing page that convert especially in 2020 where the competition is hard. So the website is not only curating texts, videos and images, it's about to retain a visitor especially in the first 5 to 10 seconds of his visit, and let him to keep scrolling until you convince him to be a prospect, lead or follower. This is the game. So i believe that a website is not only a simple design, it's a design plus marketing strategy to close the deal in your mind, that's why i advise you to have a special designer in building yours, who knowa exactly the aim of designing in the way he feels that will convert following your business ides.
